title: if this does not prove Darius is broken, no other video in League will..

replies.body: Why was Soraka healing Darius?

> [{quoted}](name=Aries Burst,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=T0nzZV0H,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-09-23T15:16:24.201+0000)
>
> Why was Soraka healing Darius?

really? where?
Was making a joke about Darius's heal :3
XD that was hilarious.
never played WoW but this was very well made
Its so much better if you get the references to the soundclips he plays.
-50dkp never gets old

Me neither.
Played runescape/broodwar as a kid.

You think that is bad...


https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IysNffBIkSo

That one doesn't do much to convince me :P I mean, yeah he's OP, but that video was like a plat guy vs. silvers If I recall, and the first 2 guys didn't fight him, he literally 1v1'd a running opponent twice, and then yasuo is probably the worst champ for fighting him :P

Also he kited well, he dodged the Jarvan Q's, and I think ONE of those many Q's didn't heal. The rest the enemies chased him into it and he didn't even need to run to them.
I thought something was amiss when I saw Yasuo try to windwall his E.
also don't forget that Darius was chugging hp pots the entire time and no one on the enemy team even used a flask charge, honestly Darius's enemies were just really bad :P

They all ran at him one at a time and he had a level advantage on each one of them. Yasuo he had a 1 lvl advantage. Jarvan he had a 2 lvl advantage. Lee he had a 3 lvl advantage tho if lee would have landed the Q Darius would have died.
All I have to say to this video is "play like retards lose like retards"
Hey I love seeing a yasuo telling darius he's broken.  He had his own limelight of brokenness also.
Meanwhile... down in bot lane it's been jinx/vayne meta for centuries and nobody bats an eye at that.
Wasn't it just corki, sivir and graves not too long ago?
In early S5 yes.
Darius is OP, not broken
What's the difference?

Stupidly strong feast or famine champs. 
Kinda like pre-rework rengar. 
or Sion pre-rework.

Darius is just overpowered, which means he has too much power, which means he just needs some tuning.

I think broken just means that no matter how many times you tweak the number it will eventually just be way better to re-work them or change an ability effect. Rengar was really bad before his rework. If he didn't get a single kill he would be completely useless, but if he got started he would just carry the whole game with really stupid snowballing. 
And it was either you had a feast and you stomp the enemy team or you just did nothing and ended up feeding or just generally having almost zero impact.

But the two terms get mixed up and muddled and it doesn't particularly matter to most players.

> [{quoted}](name=Blue Moon Wolf,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=T0nzZV0H,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-09-23T17:27:21.354+0000)
>
> {{champion:82}} a raid boss? on his own after his rework? XD

He already has a Dragon Ghost. When you defeat the first part of the dungeon in Bottom Lane, a cinematic starts and he will enter the lane. You have to stop him from getting to your tower. If a single one of your group members die, Mordekaiser will spawn a clone of them that will fight against you. Healers should be careful when doing this since healer ghosts will heal Mordekaiser.
His banrate is 91% 0_0
or the easiest way to do it. Take malz top lane and watch darius cry at the tower.

Seriously, who rolls need on the SpaceJam DVD boxset?! Now I've gotta run the raid AGAIN!

Not really, cough its called a Gnar kite! XD heck get Vayne in there too GG, people complain too much. If you just fully engage Darius you should be punished for it. HE HAS NO ESCAPE except flash so either he kills or dies. its called peeling! XD video is just about people not knowing how to deal with a Darius.  And in ranked people just don't want to deal with it. If Fiora gets life steal then so should Darius ! except Darius cant parry everything in the universe or get a tactical roll/charge or something. Riots changing things up and that's good !!! so stop crying !

I just went against a renekton mid lane as yasuo and I got shrekted in ranked.  1 combo at lv 2 from renekton took 50% of my health, and I could barely trade any damage back because of his stun.  Once he got pickaxe brutalizer his combo did about 80% of my health, then he flashes onto me in 2 seconds later = dead in under 10 seconds.  I gave up csing after 10 mins.

Went like 0/8/0 for the first 15 minutes.  Still managed to win by building tank yasuo with randuins, bork, and bt.

GGwp.  

I just beat a darius as volibear jungle in ranked, even tho darius won lane against my renekton top by getting 3-4 solo kills. Darius ain't op.  It's all about the matchup.  Ran straight up him and flipped him.
I like the all need rolls for the loot he dropped. +1
